text: int main ( ) { int t , cost , i , n , a [ 1000 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) if ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] ) { cost = cost + a [ i ] ; a [ i + 1 ] = a [ i ] ; } else { cost = cost + a [ i + 1 ] ; a [ i + 1 ] = a [ i + 1 ] ; } printf ( "%d" , cost ) ; cost = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
